text: Number Ones is a compilation album by American singer Michael Jackson, released on November 13, 2003. The album features a collection of his most successful singles, showcasing his impact on pop music throughout various phases of his career. It includes hit tracks like "Billie Jean," "Beat It," "Black or White," and "You Are Not Alone," among others. The album is notable for representing Jackson's legacy as one of the best-selling artists in music history. Alongside his chart-topping hits, Number Ones also includes a couple of new tracks, such as "One More Chance." Number Ones received positive reviews from critics and was commercially successful, reaching high positions on various international music charts. The album serves as a comprehensive overview of Michael Jackson's contributions to pop music, cementing his status as the "King of Pop."
title: Number Ones (Michael Jackson album)
